data: {"concept_id": "backstory", "concept_name": "Backstory", "type": "element", "definition": "Past experiences shaping present motive, fear, belief, and behavior—the emotional DNA under every scene.", "scope_notes": "Revealed in pieces through action, dialogue, choice, and texture; can be hidden, implied, echoed, or explicitly revealed. Potency varies (low/medium/high).", "axes": "subelement|potency", "axis_values": "reveal|echo|imply|trace | low|medium|high", "prerequisites": "", "pairs_well_with": "character|voice|tension|structure|theme", "conflicts_with": "info_dump|irrelevance|flat_delivery|tone_mismatch", "positive_examples_ref": "ex_backstory_*", "non_examples_ref": "ex_backstory_weak_*", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_reveal_modes", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "reveal", "description": "Backstory made visible via dialogue, flashback/vision, narrative summary, artifacts, confrontation, discovery, or setting.", "detection_hint": "Explicit past facts at charged moments.", "false_positive_risks": "Expository dump unrelated to present conflict.", "minimal_example": "She shows the letter: 'He knew. He always knew.'", "counterexample": "Two-page history drop that stalls the scene.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_echo_habits", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "echo", "description": "Past reverberates through present behavior, mood, diction, objects, and dynamics.", "detection_hint": "Repeated gestures, guarded answers, keepsakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Random quirks with no thematic link.", "minimal_example": "His hand hovers at the doorknob—the way it did the night he left.", "counterexample": "A mannerism introduced once then forgotten.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_imply_clues", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "imply", "description": "Hints invite inference: suggestive details, subtext, contradictions, selective memory.", "detection_hint": "Unexplained scars, evasions, charged objects.", "false_positive_risks": "So vague it reads as noise; red herrings with no payoff.", "minimal_example": "She pockets the child's bracelet without a word.", "counterexample": "Opaque hints that never cohere.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_trace_residue", "signal_type": "textual_cue", "axis_value": "trace", "description": "Residue of the past shaping choices unconsciously.", "detection_hint": "Tics, avoidance routes, attachment patterns.", "false_positive_risks": "One-off behavior with no consistency.", "minimal_example": "He takes the long way home to avoid the ward.", "counterexample": "Random detour with no pattern.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_potency_low", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "low", "description": "Quiet texture coloring scenes; not steering plot yet.", "detection_hint": "Small echoes; low stakes.", "false_positive_risks": "Atmosphere without character link.", "minimal_example": "She hums her mother’s hymn while packing.", "counterexample": "Huge info drop treated as ambiance.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_potency_med", "signal_type": "structural_pattern", "axis_value": "medium", "description": "Past actively influences choices and conflict; partial reveals carry stakes.", "detection_hint": "Secrets disclosed; goals tied to history.", "false_positive_risks": "Coincidental reveals with no consequence.", "minimal_example": "He won’t sign because last time cost his sister custody.", "counterexample": "A backstory scene that never affects behavior.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "signal_id": "sig_potency_high", "signal_type": "outcome_change", "axis_value": "high", "description": "Past detonates in the present; identity/relationships transform; no reset.", "detection_hint": "Showdowns, confessions, irreversible reveals.", "false_positive_risks": "Spectacle without lasting change.", "minimal_example": "She admits she made the call; the marriage ends.", "counterexample": "Explosive reveal followed by total reset.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "misconception_id": "info_dump", "description": "Stopping the scene to lecture the past.", "tells": "Page-long summary unrelated to present pressure.", "likely_causes": "Front-loading worldbuilding; fear of confusion.", "corrective_feedback": "Drip details at conflict peaks; tie every reveal to a choice or cost.", "micro_drill": "Split one dump into 3 reveals attached to actions.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "misconception_id": "irrelevance", "description": "Backstory that doesn’t alter motive, stakes, or relationships.", "tells": "Trivia that could be cut with no effect.", "likely_causes": "Author curiosity over character consequence.", "corrective_feedback": "Cut or convert to echo/trace that pressures decisions.", "micro_drill": "Delete 3 lines and add 1 choice that shows its effect.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "misconception_id": "flat_delivery", "description": "Mechanical telling that misses emotion and stakes.", "tells": "Neutral tone during charged history.", "likely_causes": "Avoiding melodrama; info-first impulse.", "corrective_feedback": "Anchor reveal in conflict or vulnerability.", "micro_drill": "Rewrite reveal inside an argument or deadline.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"concept_id": "backstory", "misconception_id": "tone_mismatch", "description": "Reveal style clashes with scene mood or voice.", "tells": "Grand confessional in a breezy caper scene.", "likely_causes": "Forced exposition timing.", "corrective_feedback": "Choose reveal mode that suits scene pressure.", "micro_drill": "Swap to object-reveal or echo in same moment.", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_backstory_identify_subelement_potency", "concept_id": "backstory", "cognitive_goal": "identify", "task_type": "classify", "prompt_template": "Label each passage as Reveal, Echo, Imply, or Trace and mark potency (low/medium/high). Justify.", "expected_features": "Correct subelement + potency; cite signal; name consequence or texture.", "scoring_method": "pattern|rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Accurate labels with precise signals and effect on scene.", "Meets": "Mostly accurate with basic justification.", "Developing": "Labels or justifications off; no link to scene."}, "distractor_strategy": "Include trivia dumps and red-herring quirks.", "hint_steps": "1) What changes now? 2) How shown? 3) How loud is the past?", "variation_axes": "stakes|timing|mode", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_backstory_place_reveal", "concept_id": "backstory", "cognitive_goal": "analyze", "task_type": "order", "prompt_template": "Choose where to place a reveal for maximum impact (early/strategic/late) and explain.", "expected_features": "Placement improves stakes/clarity; ties to conflict peak.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Placement re-frames scene and escalates stakes.", "Meets": "Reasonable placement with some effect.", "Developing": "Placement arbitrary; no effect."}, "distractor_strategy": "Tempt early dump or too-late confusion.", "hint_steps": "1) Identify pressure point 2) Place reveal 3) Name the new question", "variation_axes": "genre|pace", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_backstory_transform_dump_to_echo", "concept_id": "backstory", "cognitive_goal": "revise", "task_type": "transform", "prompt_template": "Rewrite an info-dump into a present-moment echo or imply using objects, subtext, or behavior.", "expected_features": "Cuts exposition; adds behavior/object; keeps meaning.", "scoring_method": "rubric", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Subtext carries history; scene momentum improves.", "Meets": "Less exposition; some present tension added.", "Developing": "Meaning lost or still expository."}, "distractor_strategy": "Vague hints with no coherence.", "hint_steps": "1) Pick a prop/gesture 2) Tie to desire 3) Let the reaction leak", "variation_axes": "object|gesture|diction", "difficulty": 2, "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"blueprint_id": "bp_backstory_diagnose_potency_shift", "concept_id": "backstory", "cognitive_goal": "diagnose", "task_type": "spot_fix", "prompt_template": "This backstory sits at medium potency. Nudge it to high without adding a monologue.", "expected_features": "Irreversible consequence or relationship shift now.", "scoring_method": "pattern", "rubric_levels": {"Exceeds": "Shift lands with lasting cost.", "Meets": "Some consequence; partially lasting.", "Developing": "Spectacle, no change."}, "distractor_strategy": "Pure dramatization without cost.", "hint_steps": "1) Add cost 2) Remove escape 3) Let someone pay", "variation_axes": "relationship|public_vs_private", "difficulty": 3, "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_reveal_1", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "reveal|high", "label": "strong", "text": "She lays the court order on the table. 'I gave him up.' Silence reshapes the room.", "context_tags": "confession|family", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_echo_1", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "echo|low", "label": "strong", "text": "He straightens every frame before sitting. The crooked one stays crooked.", "context_tags": "habit|control", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_imply_1", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "imply|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "A kids’ menu tucked into his wallet, folded to hide the crayon scribble.", "context_tags": "object|secret", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_trace_1", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "trace|medium", "label": "strong", "text": "At sirens, her shoulders drop before she smiles. 'It’s fine.'", "context_tags": "physiology|mask", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_weak_1", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Two pages explaining childhood in the middle of a chase.", "context_tags": "info_dump", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}

{"example_id": "ex_backstory_weak_2", "concept_id": "backstory", "axis_value": "", "label": "weak", "text": "Random scar mentioned once, never matters.", "context_tags": "irrelevant_hint", "source_file": "Character Backstory.md", "source_md5": "05d6d6fbe0acd47a9918279aea3cb9ac", "last_modified_iso": "2025-09-30T18:16:27.804370Z"}
